item.title: ET
item.description: score:-118 Chances: The company’s diverse segments, including natural gas transportation, midstream, NGL and refined products transportation, and crude oil transportation, provide opportunities for growth and revenue. Securing contracts worth approximately $200 million by Oceaneering’s Manufactured Products segment and the acquisition deals for Utica and Northern Delaware Basin assets by Northern positions the company for future success and expansion in major U.

item.title: DASH
item.description: score:55 Chances: The new law regarding the gig economy from the Biden administration may lead to increased employee classification for gig economy workers, potentially improving their rights and protections. DoorDash’s exclusive early release of the new Golden Carolina BBQ Tenders as part of their partnership with Cracker Barrel Old Country Store may attract more customers and drive sales.

item.title: HIMS
item.description: score:108 Chances: Hims & Hers Health, Inc. unveiled Weight Loss by Hims & Hers, a comprehensive and customizable clinical approach specifically designed to help people achieve their individual weight-loss goals. The company has appointed Craig Primack, a pioneer in the field of clinical obesity medicine, as SVP of Weight Management, indicating a strong focus on addressing the growing issue of obesity.
